name: Ramen Bowl Chicken Roll
description:
Ramen Bowl Chicken Roll

Be the last down the hill to not end up in a Ramen Bowl!

Created at TOJam: FlirTEEN With Danger!

2-4 Player Local Multiplayer Game

Controls:

Only works with a controller at the moment.

  • Press "A" Xbox Button to join at the start of a round.
  • Left analog stick to move side to side.
  • Hold down "A" Xbox Button and let go to launch your opponents towards the bowl.
  • Press "R" on keyboard to restart game if anything is not working

Created by: Ata Dogan, Tibi Leonov, Peter Lu, Sukhraj Johal
